full_summary:
==============================================================

**Request for Proposal: Professional Audit Support Services**
==============================================================

**Reference Number:** cb-37-52428589
**Solicitation Number:** W7680-24-R009
**Publication Date:** 2023-11-10
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-12-01T14:00:00
**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-01-01
**Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-12-31

**Notice Type:**
----------------

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is issued by the Department of National Defence (DND) to procure professional audit support services to support the department's fraud risk management program.

**Objective:**
-------------

The Department of National Defence is seeking a qualified supplier to provide forensic accounting and audit services to conduct a department-wide fraud risk assessment, develop a corporate fraud risk profile, and provide recommendations to senior management on anti-fraud controls.

**Scope of Work:**
-----------------

The successful contractor shall:

* Conduct a department-wide fraud risk assessment in consultation with DND's pre-established FRA Scoping Plan
* Develop a corporate fraud risk profile that will serve as a point of reference for future organizational fraud risk re-assessments
* Provide recommendations to senior management on anti-fraud controls to complement existing controls

**Security Requirements:**
------------------------

The contractor shall comply with security requirements as outlined in the Common PS Security Requirements Check List and Industrial Security Manual.

**Trade Agreements:**
--------------------

The requirement is subject to the provisions of the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and other trade agreements.

**Contract Period:**
------------------

The proposed contract period shall be from the date of contract award to December 31, 2025, with an option to extend for a period of up to one year.

**Contact Information:**
----------------------

For more information, please contact:

* Martin Gravel, Contracting Authority
* Email: [Martin.Gravel@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Martin.Gravel@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (613) 555-3172

**Important Note:**
------------------

The Professional Audit Support Services (PASS) Method of Supply is subject to quarterly refresh cycles. Suppliers interested in becoming a qualified supplier should contact the below email address for more information.
